Class Mutant

java.lang.Object
characters.Character
characters.Hero
characters.heroes.Mutant
All Implemented Interfaces:
combat.Combatant, Serializable
public class Mutant extends Hero
Represents a subclass of Hero called Mutant. Mutants are meta-humans with extraordinary powers used to protect others. Real-world analogs include characters like Flash, Superman, Cyclops, and Storm. The key attribute of this class is Mutant Energy (ME), which enhances attack damage and fuels the use of special abilities.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Mutant

      public Mutant(String name, int healthPoints, int willPoints, int strength)
      Constructs a Mutant hero with the given attributes. Initializes Mutant Energy based on the hero's level.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the mutant
      healthPoints - the initial health points
      willPoints - the initial will points
      strength - the initial strength value

  • Method Details

    • gainExp

      public void gainExp(int exp)
      Grants experience to the mutant and updates their maximum Mutant Energy based on the new level.
      Overrides:
      gainExp in class Hero
      Parameters:
      exp - the amount of experience gained

    • getAttackDamage

      public int getAttackDamage()
      Calculates the attack damage dealt by the mutant. If Mutant Energy is available, adds +2 damage and consumes 1 energy.
      Returns:
      the total damage dealt

    • getMutantEnergy

      public int getMutantEnergy()
      Returns the current Mutant Energy.
      Returns:
      the current energy value

    • setMutantEnergy

      Sets the current Mutant Energy.
      Parameters:
      newMutantEnergy - the new energy value

    • getMaxMutantEnergy

      public int getMaxMutantEnergy()

      Returns:
      the maximum energy value

    • useSpecialSkill

      public void useSpecialSkill(combat.Combatant target)
      Executes the mutant's special skill: "Restore Energy".
      Parameters:
      target - the combatant receiving the damage
